data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Bokeo, Laos to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bokeo, Laos
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 149,700 people living in Bokeo.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Bokeo to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Bokeo that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Arem people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 144,051 who are far from you in Bokeo, Laos from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 149,700 citizens of the the state of Bokeo.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Bokeo, Laos and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

location.name: Bokeo
location.people_groups_list: Giay, Ir, Con, Katang, Southern, Cham, Western
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Giay (7,300), Ir (6,100), Con (2,200), Katang, Southern (42,000), Cham, Western (600)
